website_summaries.verdict: The brand is a classic, and many shavers will appreciate the soothing qualities of an alcohol-free balm compared to the traditional CK splash colognes.
pros: Does not sting skin like alcohol splashes
Mixes well with most users' body chemistry
cons: Some reports of fakes on the market
Minimal aroma, does not last long

customer_reviews.title: Returning to an old favorite
customer_reviews.text: I had not worn Obsession for Men (or any other after-shave) for years. At the birthday party of my grown niece, she confided in me that as a child (about 30 years ago) she loved my aftershave and even how she could sense the aroma in my luggage when I came and visited my sister's family. I know my spouse does not like the other family favorite, Old Spice, and I decided to try something that would last me even though expensive. The non-alcoholic Obsession for Men Aftershave Baum is perfect and very soothing, and I can use it quite sparingly. No one remarks on it so I assume it is not overpowering. And I love the scent myself.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Possibly fake aftershave balm
customer_reviews.text: I've bought CK Obsession for Men aftershave balm for years, and the last two bottles I received appear to contain straight-off-the-grocery-store-shelf hand lotion. It looks and smells nothing like the real deal. Will be sending mine back. Recommend you either buy directly from CK or from a different retailer altogether.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fite

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves this!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product for my husband for many years and he loves it. This after shave balm smells great and if you like OBESSION cologne you will love this. My husband also claims that this after shave balm is easy on the skin and leaves it soft with smell he loves.
customer_reviews.author: K.T.McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Obsession After Sahve Balm
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for quite a few years. This time when I received the product I noticed that it was very thin in conistency compared to previous tubes I had used. As a result when I would squeeze the tube I would end up with way too much product on my palms and most of it would be wasted. I will not order this product again
customer_reviews.author: Stubbs

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Aftershave Balm
customer_reviews.text: Finding Clavin Klein at local stores and others is becoming difficult. I've used this shave balm a number of years now. I don't like liquid aftershave - stings. Lotions are better for me. The scent of Obsession is rather light and not over bearing.
customer_reviews.author: NJM

customer_reviews.title: Great aftershave for hubby
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this without knowing what this smells like.....this had such good reviews and was on so many sites for top ten aftershave scents I went on a limb and glad I did. Not over powering, not like a pine forest, just enough.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyTampa

customer_reviews.title: After shave Obsession by Calvin Klein  love it.
customer_reviews.text: Nice size tube of Obsession. Smells wonderful.. I would recommend to Men or Women. Sandra
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: Still the best for me.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product, since it first appeared on the market, as with all good products cost have raised over the years. But still like the products Calvin Klein makes.
customer_reviews.author: pactac

customer_reviews.title: My Wife Loves the Smell of Obsession
customer_reviews.text: My wife picked out Obsession Shave Balm because she loves the way it smells on me. It's a good product that's the perfect ending to my morning shave.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed wth Obsession
customer_reviews.text: Love that this is available. It came in a little plastic bag, not the original box (if there ever was one, but I recall it being boxed at the fragrance counter). To make it gift-worthy, I took off the ugly plastic wrap & beautified it with a nice gift box. Otherwise, the tube didn't appear tampered with, it was full, and had that heavenly Obsession scent.
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not the same fragrance, dispenser poor design
customer_reviews.text: Not the same fragrance as was two years ago. Also, consistently is thinner and the tube it comes in releases way too much each time whereas the last one had a smaller hole through which product was dispensed
customer_reviews.author: ronnie wimberley

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever
customer_reviews.text: I have a very heavy beard, but tender skin. This product is the best I have ever used. I have used it for decades and it has no competition. It is expensive, but worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Peguese

customer_reviews.title: Classic Obsession Scent
customer_reviews.text: Love this balm! Classic Obsession scent not as strong as in years past, however still soothing on the face with a clean fragrance. Difficult to find of late and pricy, but lasts a long time. I'm glad Amazon has it available.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy Walker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great after shave balm and a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Not authentic product
customer_reviews.text: This product is not good. Supposed to be a balm, it’s actually more liquid, maybe like a very thin cream. And it doesn’t smell good, not at all like the product I’ve always purchased at Macy’s.
customer_reviews.author: Mogolf

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband. He really loves this after shave.
customer_reviews.author: Ceilca

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t have “Obsession “ aroma
customer_reviews.text: Used for an after shave balm. Disappointed by lack of aroma.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This fragrance is one of my favorites and finding it here was a plus. I bought this for my husband for Fathers Day. He loved it. I love the fact of getting a larger size and the after shave balm is exactly what I wanted. The scent is not too strong and yet it has a lasting effect. Great seller and fast shipping was a plus.
customer_reviews.author: ibbakin

customer_reviews.title: Husbands Favorite
customer_reviews.text: My husband's favorite and so easy to order from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Not only a nice scent, but the balm is comforting after a ...
customer_reviews.text: Have used Obsession after shave balm for years and years. Not only a nice scent, but the balm is comforting after a shave.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly Scent!
customer_reviews.text: If you use balm; This is one of the best smelling balms on the market!
customer_reviews.author: donna duran

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: This is my husbands favorite after shave. It is hard to find in the stores and I was glad to find it on Amazon. I bought it as a gift and I get to enjoy his using the Balm. sniff sniff
customer_reviews.author: MP's World

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product!!!! Very smooth when applied. Keeps skin very soft and the scent is very soft. Keeps face moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Want your husband to smell great?
customer_reviews.text: My husband always gets compliments on how he smells when he wears Obession!
customer_reviews.author: td

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Product
customer_reviews.text: The product comes in a large container, which will last a long time. The scent is great. It is creamy and very soothing. Came exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Skullptor

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to apply and does the job it says oit will do!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for several years from a clerk in Macy's. I have found it lasts and is good for the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Keith J. Wise

customer_reviews.title: Great Smell
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for men, bottle is small for the price, but dose last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Great skin product.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for years along with Obsession cologne.
customer_reviews.author: retherfordk

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find
customer_reviews.text: Have been using tis for years works very well soothing and very light fragrance. I use to get it a dept store but they never seem to stock it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Palmieri

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's the fragrance that my hubby loved, and I do too.....
customer_reviews.author: Beth R

customer_reviews.title: Smooth to the Skin
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product that I have been using for over 20 years. It was a nice surprise to find it at such a bargain price with the fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great balm, hard to find
customer_reviews.text: This form of Obsession has been around for a while and, after fruitless searching, I was happy to relocate it through Amazon.com. It, along with Polo's green-bottle after shave balm, are top of the list for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jack M. Averill

customer_reviews.title: Good smelling man
customer_reviews.text: it smells so nice on my husband. He hasn't had any for a while and when I saw it on amazon I just jad to surprise him with it.
customer_reviews.author: Misto

customer_reviews.title: Obsession Shave Balm
customer_reviews.text: This has a great scent and is soothing on a recently shaved face.
customer_reviews.author: Keithbm

customer_reviews.title: Meets Expectations
customer_reviews.text: This product isn't available in local stores. Glad it is available through you. It is the same quality as in store and was delivered promptly with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Robert E. Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product also and will act as a great cover up too!
customer_reviews.author: Silver Streak

customer_reviews.title: all products
customer_reviews.text: All products where very good and satisfying and will uses again. Would hope there is additional coupons or saving in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Sherron

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell. Very happy with the speedy delivery. Received within days of ordering, not the 8-10 days i expected to have to wait. Thank you so much! Will be ordering again soon.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: Great after shave.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best smelling after shaves , and it really is soothing. It is not expensive either, as a small amount goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Reads

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this lotion. It moisturizes his face while leaving a nice scent. Not too strong, just right.
customer_reviews.author: anna johnson

customer_reviews.title: My OBSESSION!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the fragrance of CK OBSESSION and always get nice comments when I wear it. I also like the fact that the fragrance lingers on the body and doesn't fade away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my hasbands favorite shave balm. It's gotten to be very hard to find in Dept stores.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: PLEASANT AND SMOOTHING
customer_reviews.text: THE ODOR IN NOT STRONG AND THIS PRODUCT MAKES MY FACE FEEL SMOOTH.. THE ODOR FROM THIS PRODUCT KEEPS A LOW PROFILE.
customer_reviews.author: HAL METS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this cream, I have been using this for 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: It works great for me and everyone likes the smell
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for many years. It works great for me and everyone likes the smell. Also used the Obsession All Over Body Wash for many year as my shampoo. Any of that I can find is out of site in price. Appears it must have been discontinued,
customer_reviews.author: E M Campbell Jr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent After Shave Balm
customer_reviews.text: Having used this for a long time, it is a soothing and long lasting aftershave, with a more subtle smell that does not ruin the effect.
customer_reviews.author: Walter LaFeber  Walter LaFeber

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful smell and works well as an aftershave balm
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful smell and works well as an aftershave balm. It is not too greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Qais A.

customer_reviews.title: Obcession After Shave Balm
customer_reviews.text: This item was perfect! It is impossible to find in local stores! I apreciate the great serviceThank you so very much!
customer_reviews.author: Ralph

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE, STILL WAITING FOR DAMAGED PRODUCT TO BE REPLACED
customer_reviews.text: I ORDERED THE PRODUCT FOR XMAS, KNOWING IT WOULD COME IN JAN. IT CAME WITH NO PRODUCT LEFT IN TUBE. THEY PACKED IT IN AN ENVELOPE AND NO PRODUCT WAS LEFT IN TUBE. STILL WAITING FOR MAILING LABEL TO GET TO ME TO GET A REPLACEMENT.
customer_reviews.author: LOTTA

customer_reviews.title: Obsession by Calvin Klein
customer_reviews.text: Obsession is the BEST after shave balm on the market closely followed by Eternity also by Calvin, love both of these balms and have used them for years, tried others and a couple have come close but don't quite match up with my two favorites, Thanks Calvin.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Young

customer_reviews.title: This is my husbands favorite after shave
customer_reviews.text: This is my husbands favorite after shave. It is hard to find in stores any more. So glad we could get it here.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Hernton

customer_reviews.title: Sunshine
customer_reviews.text: This is such a wonderful product. I bought it for my friend and not only did his skin feel soft the aroma was not over bearing, (nor the price). Just a Fresh Friend. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: ~~ Sunshine ~~

customer_reviews.title: Good Lord that's a lot of money!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works really well for sensitive skin that is easily irritated from shaving and it smells great. My only complaint is that it's $50 a freaking bottle but it only takes a dab to sooth my whole face so it lasts a long time. All the cheap crap from Wal-Mart will never see another penny from me!
customer_reviews.author: snowhound

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice, but not overpowering, scent; good for the face that sees a lot of sun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: My favorite aftershave balm - excellent - a big pricey, but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and I like her having it
customer_reviews.text: My wife asked for this in her stocking, as she always does. She loves it, and I like her having it. Keeps her soft and the fragrance is great as well. A bit pricey, but she does not use it as her every day skin care.
customer_reviews.author: surprise

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Soothing after shave with just a hint of a refreshing scent. Smooth and creamy. Just a small dab is all that you need. Makes your skin feel moist and smooth. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Donald J. Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Women love it!
customer_reviews.text: This after shave balm really turns the women on. My attraction to women is way beyond what I expected. Also good for your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Poehler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the richness of the fragrance....so does everyone else around me....:)
customer_reviews.author: peter

customer_reviews.title: Obsession After Shave Balm
customer_reviews.text: What more can I say, it's the only balm that I like using after I shave, leaves my face moistened and feeling smoother...
customer_reviews.author: Raa

customer_reviews.title: Hubby's Birthday
customer_reviews.text: He really like the fragrance and that it is a balm. Not messy like splash on. Obsession has a great fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: BF

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice scent. I had been trying to find a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice scent. I had been trying to find a pleasant after shave for my husband and this seems to be it.
customer_reviews.author: Zeni

customer_reviews.title: After Shave Balm
customer_reviews.text: My husband has used very little of this product but so far he likes the feel and of course the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Punkie Lee

customer_reviews.title: Delighted with this product
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of Obsession and the after shave balm (my husband says) is very soothing. I am extremely happy with the service as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Coombs

customer_reviews.title: Calvin Klein Obsession shave balm
customer_reviews.text: I am sensitive to many fragrances, so this was subtle, and my husband liked it. Will definitely purchase this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda B

customer_reviews.title: My husband has used it for years and everyone loves ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband has used it for years and everyone loves the fragrance on him and comments. Light and not overpowering
customer_reviews.author: Julie Hilton

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size with great fragrance. Get many compliments when I wear this.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: IF YOU TRY IT ONCE, YOU'LL BE SOLD
customer_reviews.text: Have used Obcession After Shave Balm before and it works well for me. It really helps the razor burn big time and I'm always getting compliments about how good It smells. A definate magnet for the ladies!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Williams

customer_reviews.title: But I really like it. It doesn't take much
customer_reviews.text: I was kind of leery of paying this much for this stuff. But I really like it. It doesn't take much. Smells great and when it dries it seems to tighten my skin a bit in a good way.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth M. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: great stuff
customer_reviews.text: If you have sensitive sin or just need to shave frequently enough to get the occasional razor burn, buy this balm. It smells good and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Irwin Gordon

customer_reviews.title: I was ordering a new one. My old one ...
customer_reviews.text: I was ordering a new one. My old one was running out. The tube was identical in copy, smaller and the contents not the same as my old one. I will not be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Calvin Klein OBSESSION for Men After Shave Balm, 5 Fl Oz
product_meta.description: Intense. Unforgettable. Provocative. Skin-caring formula that moisturizes and soothes skin. Lightly scented with the intensive and unforgettable fragrance of OBSESSION MEN.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
